alert.note: Alert for Butler; Miami; Montgomery; Preble; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:25AM EDT until July 29 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Preble County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Butler County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Montgomery County in west central Ohio... Southern Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 515 AM EDT. * At 425 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gratis, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Middletown, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Springboro, Vandalia, Englewood, Monroe, Trenton, Franklin, Tipp City, Moraine, Carlisle, West Milton, Oakwood, South Middletown and Wright-Patterson Afb. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 14 and 40. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 29 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
